The Human Rights Campaign (HRC) is the nation‚Äôs largest LGBTQ civil rights org. They envision a world where LGBTQ people are ensured equality at home, at work, and in every community. March 9th is their annual black-tie gala and BOS is hosting their Official After Party. We will be hosting the FIRST OFFICIAL party held in an exclusive VIP space at the Concourse Dance Bar. post_content: The summer is coming to an end. Time for one more dip in the pool! The boys of BOS Philly are bringing you the ONLY gay pool party in Philly. Bring your sexiest swimsuit, and a towel in case you get soaking wet! Chill by the pool listening to the sounds of DJ K!RK & TeaKez!

Nut Cracker is the titillating gift that keeps on giving! So slip into your naughtiest holiday outfits, and join us for the merriest, most glamorous party of the season! This will be one unforgettable night where you'll be begging Santa to put you on his naughty list!

On June 4th, 2023, BOS Philly is taking over the Muses Stage at the Philadelphia Pride Festival, right in the heart of the Gayborhood!

Join us on Locust Street, between Juniper and 13th Street, as we take over the stage from 1pm to 4:30pm with the HOTTEST beats and COOLEST DJs from our amazing community!

At 1pm, prepare to be mesmerized by Riva and Bianca from Solar Sounds as they kick-start the ultimate celebration!

At 2:30pm, let the electrifying sounds of DJ K!RK take you on a wild ride with the best circuit music this city has ever experienced!

We plan to pack the streets with non-stop energy and the most unforgettable dance party EVER! You seriously don't want to miss this! Come and make some memories with us and dance the day away under the sun as we celebrate PRIDE, love, and unity!

Don't forget to spread the word and let's make Philly Pride 2023 the most talked-about event of the year!
